data.name: Ari's Journey Soundtrack
data.detailed_description: Ari's Journey OST features all the tracks from the game presented in a wonderful listening experience with 1 hour 40 minutes of music. In addition to all the orchestral music from the game, the OST includes retro 8-bit versions of all the tracks. This soundtrack is a masterpiece original work composed by Mat Campbell.
data.about_the_game: Ari's Journey OST features all the tracks from the game presented in a wonderful listening experience with 1 hour 40 minutes of music. In addition to all the orchestral music from the game, the OST includes retro 8-bit versions of all the tracks. This soundtrack is a masterpiece original work composed by Mat Campbell.
data.short_description: Ari's Journey OST features all the tracks from the game presented in a wonderful listening experience with 1 hour 40 minutes of music. In addition to all the orchestral music from the game, the OST includes retro 8-bit versions of all the tracks.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 130 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1400 MB available space
